# llms.txt — Guidelines for AI agents and crawlers
# More info: https://llmstxt.org/

site: https://nofud.vc
base_path: /
contact: contact@nofudinc.com

rules:
  - allow: /
  - disallow: /api/

purpose:
  - research
  - indexing

attribution:
  required: true
  format: "Source: No FUD Ventures (nofud.vc)"

license: "All content © No FUD Ventures. Non-commercial use allowed with attribution."
